title: Stepping Stones: The Huntress Series of Short Stories
description: Based on the universe of the sci-fi novel The Huntress, this series of short stories takes these charismatic characters into their future one step at a exploring unanswered questions, discovering more adventures, and developing their bonds as an eclectic, unique family.A STONE'S Baynard Stone realizes that being Mea's hunting partner will require a painful sacrifice.A FAR Mea discovers that Regan is more like her than she'd care to admit, and motherhood is as much terror as joy.HEART OF Mea and Stone struggle with the concepts of commitment and compromise in their relationship.LEAVE NO STONE Curiosity gets the better of Regan as she pries into Stone’s deadly, mysterious past.VERY MERRY Regan’s campaign to solidify her family hasn’t ended with her parents, much to the chagrin of the other members of the Starfire.STONE Regan finds a chance to exorcise demons forged by abuse at the hands of slavers, but can she defy her parents to meet her monsters face to face?
author: Michelle O'Leary
